snippet: Muhamed McBryde, a Muslim collegiate wrestler at the University of Buffalo who chose to sit on the sideline rather than shave his beard, was granted a waiver by the N.C.A.A. that will allow him to compete with the facial hair.
lead_paragraph: Muhamed McBryde, a Muslim collegiate wrestler at the University of Buffalo who chose to sit on the sideline rather than shave his beard, was granted a waiver by the N.C.A.A. that will allow him to compete with the facial hair.
